item.title: cessie add a quote by Harold Kushner
item.description: "I think of life as a good book. The further you get into it, the more it begins to make sense." -- Harold Kushner

item.title: cessie add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "A book is a gift you can open again and again." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: cessie add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "You cannot open a book without learning something." -- Confucius

item.title: cessie add a quote by Elizabeth Hardwick
item.description: "The greatest gift is the passion for reading. It is cheap, it consoles, it distracts, it excites, it gives you knowledge of the world and experience of a wide kind. It is a moral illumination." -- Elizabeth Hardwick

item.title: cessie add a quote by Henry Ward Beecherr
item.description: "Where is human nature so weak as in the bookstore?" -- Henry Ward Beecherr

item.title: cessie add a quote by Kathleen Thompson Norris
item.description: "Just the knowledge that a good book is awaiting one at the end of a long day makes that day happier. " -- Kathleen Thompson Norris

item.title: cessie add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: cessie add a quote by Neale Donald Walsch
item.description: "Life begins at the end of your comfort zone." -- Neale Donald Walsch

item.title: cessie add a quote by Émile Zola
item.description: "If you ask me what I came to do in this world, I, an artist, will answer you: I am here to live out loud." -- Émile Zola

item.title: cessie add a quote by Nikos Kazantzakis
item.description: "I felt once more how simple and frugal a thing is happiness: a glass of wine, a roast chestnut, a wretched little brazier, the sound of the sea. Nothing else." -- Nikos Kazantzakis

item.title: cessie add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "Books are mirrors: you only see in them what you already have inside you." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: cessie add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "A story is a letter that the author writes to himself, to tell himself things that he would be unable to discover otherwise." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón
